```{r}
# Load packages
library(bayesrules)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
# North Dakota
summarize_beta(8, 2)

# Louisiana
summarize_beta(1, 20)
```

```{r}
# North Dakota
plot_beta(8, 2)

# Louisiana
plot_beta(1, 10)
```
```{r}
# North Dakota
summarize_beta_binomial(alpha = 8, beta = 2, y = 12, n = 50)

# Louisiana
plot_beta_binomial(alpha = 8, beta = 2, y = 12, n = 50)
```

```{r}
# Louisiana
summarize_beta_binomial(alpha = 1, beta = 10, y = 12, n = 50)
```
